website_summaries.verdict: Sporty design with an LED that activates with a flick of the wrist.
pros: A simpler, but not smaller, G-Shock watch with a powerful backlight
This more colorful design is easy to read, and despite its size the watch is very comfortable
cons: Shiny wristband doesn't look as sleek as the usual G-Shock matte finish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch, great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The glossy finish looks very nice. Love the subtle blue face, and black/blue color combination. If it lasts as long as my other G Shock (which still works) I'll be even happier with it. Amazon price was very good as well. MSRP is $110, I paid $72.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Clary

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stylish
customer_reviews.text: What I liked was that it was a G-Shock. The face was big but not overwhelming. The blue accented watch face was a nice contrast and the watch was easy to program and waterproof. What I didn’t like was the shiny watch band. It looks plastic. I couldn’t pickup this image when I originally saw the watch on Amazon. It may have changed my mind but I am comfortable with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Will52

customer_reviews.title: First G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: My first G-Shock I ever own and I absolutely love it. I needed a good regular watch to wear to work that's pretty rugged and I heard the G-Shock supposedly is the toughest made watch in the world so I decided to try one for myself. I proudly can say that this watch get's the job done it's made out really good material, love the design of the watch blue is my favorite color and with black mix together the design looks really good. I think the G-Shock was worth the money and now I have a awesome regular watch I can substitute for my gear s3 frontier when I go to work or whenever I need to switch.
customer_reviews.author: BlueFlames

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and even easer to read
customer_reviews.text: Twice as large as my previous Casio, and I had to modify the watch to accept my Don Juan Stainless Steel band. Very easy to set up and even easer to read.
customer_reviews.author: Robinhood

customer_reviews.title: Nice size watch
customer_reviews.text: I have large hands thick wrists and forearms so I like the bigger gshocks. That being said this Gshock fits me well, it’s shiny blue and black case and band that makes it more unique than cheap looking for being a Gshock. My work uniform is blue and dark blue so matches well love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice watch that wasn't too expensive or flashy for work. I work with water on a regular basis and needed something that would fit both in the field and at a meeting and this watch was very nice. I really liked the 100 series, but they didn't get good reviews for seeing it at night. Unfortunately, I do a lot of activities at night so that one was off the list. The color was just right, not too blue or flashy. Light works great and it has all your daily info (day of week, date, & second count) that is easily read on the face. Great watch and I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful watch! Easy to read the time and the color is exactly what I was looking for! My boyfriend was so happy with his new watch to add to his collection!
customer_reviews.author: Robs💙

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to men ages 16-36
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my brother who is turning 18 this year. This watch looks great on him and he absolutely loves it. I'm so happy I got this for him and appreciate the Prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: butternutsquash

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my son and he loved it, wears it every day. Quality product like all of the other gshock watches I own
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: ... was a gift for my LEO fiancé and he loved it. He wears it every night to work ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my LEO fiancé and he loved it. He wears it every night to work and uses it for FST's and timing other various field tests while on duty. HE says he really likes that it is digital, although I would have preferred an analog. He says it also lights up so when he's in the dark, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. He REALLY loved it, This is a great quality watch do not hesitate to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: ... husband is an independent contractor and goes through watches like it's no ones business
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an independent contractor and goes through watches like it's no ones business. I got this for him and it is holding up perfectly! No scratches, rips, tears, or broken bands....loooove it. And it is so sexy!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Mom Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and light weight. The blue adds a very nice color to the watch, makes it stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Cust

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is well worth it's price! I got this as a gift but had an uneasy feeling about the quality. I was uniquely surprised to find when I received it, the watch was actually better looking in person than in the picture. Thank you.!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Meets and exceeds all expectations
customer_reviews.text: This watch was exactly what I needed. All functions work and the black and blue look is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking G-Shock!
customer_reviews.text: I love the blue face on this one, but it can be harder to see in low light. However, that's not enough not to own it. It's a glossy black finish not a matte, so be aware of that if you want black matte. The glossy means it looks good casual and business casual. You can't have enough G-Shocks.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Man

customer_reviews.title: Day Of Week Will Not Set
customer_reviews.text: This is my second G Shock. First one gave away because display hard to read. This model is easy to read but cannot get the correct day of the week set, it's one day behind. Took it to watch repair and they could not get it set either. He blamed it it on Casio foreign model. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Firefighter Paramedic and I scuba dive and these watches are extremely durable and easily cleanable, even if you get some
customer_reviews.text: Durable and attractive. I'm a Firefighter Paramedic and I scuba dive and these watches are extremely durable and easily cleanable, even if you get some gross stuff on them and need to thoroughly bleach them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a nice looking, sporty watch that has an easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice looking, sporty watch that has an easy to read digital display, alarm, and good illumination in the dark. I went through a couple other trial and failures with other watches before I found this. The blue LCD display with white numerals is very cool and easy to read. It has 5 alarms. And the illumination in the dark is excellent! This is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: jjrevers

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My brother asked me to order him this watch. It was just what he was looking for and he is enjoying it. He stated that it looks good and works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch i love the color and the noise feature it has to it. And shipping was awesome on this item
customer_reviews.author: The Hector

customer_reviews.title: Gshock always makes stylish and tough watches
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my younger brother's birthday. I really love Gshock designs. They have design for everyone's personality and taste. This is a great watch and looks really good. My brother loves it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kucia

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in 2013 and it still works now
customer_reviews.author: Malika hardy

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a good quality watch.
customer_reviews.text: Good watch. Bought at a much better price than Walmart or Target. Worth buying or gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Baltodano

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: Can be a bit of a pain to get all the settings just the way you want them but once it's set up this watch works perfectly. Been using it for several months and so far no issues. Not to mention I've had a few complements on how good it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey S.

customer_reviews.title: Best gshock i have onwed.
customer_reviews.text: This my third gshock model the phone is great looking its the best quality its 5 five stars all of the way im an drivwr and I get compliments on it on a daily basis. Its a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: You Will Love This Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the blue and black mix. It’s very classy and looks way more expensive than it is. It’s just my everyday watch. Plus it was very quick getting to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: I like the blue and white display.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a older version G-shock, the display is easy to read in bright sunlight and the numbers are big.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love that watch. I like the fact that you can read the time with Polerized sun glasses. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Our son really enjoyed this as a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Our son really enjoyed this as a Christmas gift. Wears it often. Good price too. He is 23 and didn't think it was cheap looking. It's what the high school and older guys wear.
customer_reviews.author: susan 58*

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my son who is an Airman in the Airforce. Fit perfect and he loves the color and design.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Watch strap is high gloss and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: This watch was bought as a gift. Recipient appears happy with it. If it were mine, I would return it. The strap is high black gloss and looks like cheap plastic. Makes the watch appear cheap and nasty. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: HMM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nice design and color at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my 7 years old nephew, and the minute he opened the box was so happy. He said the color Glossy black with the contrast blue is so nicely matching. He liked everything of the watch. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paulino Jimenez jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sport watch.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He wears it everyday. The light function is really useful. He has been wearing it for almost 2 yrs now, and the band still looks good, no paint chip.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden H.

customer_reviews.title: Better to return the item
customer_reviews.text: Poor instructions and talked to company for help but it was unstable . after the representative set it up what seemed stable turned to unstable the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Meltzer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, great price, loved the size especially since I have large hands and arms and it was very easy to set up. The only thing I was not completely crazy about was that the wrist band is very shiny, but I could live with it since I purchased this watch for law enforcement work and my duty belt happens to have a shine to it so it matches, so it works.... Over all nice looking watch, couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I am an 18 year old college student and I do a lot of hiking, swimming, camping, and a whole bunch of outdoor activities. I wanted a watch that would not only handle my lifestyle well, but a watch that would look good at the same time. So far, I've worn this watch everyday since I got it and it still looks brand new. It has a very clear easy to read display and most importantly is that it tells time very accurately. It has a bunch of other features that you can play around with. Overall a great everyday watch!
customer_reviews.author: WadaHapa

customer_reviews.title: HUGE AND CUSTOMIZABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Casio watch fan. I look for features inside of the watch as opposed to style. This particular Casio GShock is doing what I want and more. I love having the dark blue background and white letters/numbers! I did not like the glossy band at first, but It is extremely comfortable. Only con is it scratches so easily. For a product that screams durability in its marketing I would have expected it to take a beating better. Despite the little things I am extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Breland

customer_reviews.title: Hated the band. It’s too glossy
customer_reviews.text: Watch band is high gloss and unattractive. Watch was bigger than I thought it would be. I replaced the band before I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Wick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Unlike most people I have no trouble seeing the face ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most people I have no trouble seeing the face in most any lighting. I've gotten quite a few compliments on it. I personally think it looks a little cheap though - its very shiny plastic. wasn't expecting it to be that shiny. I only wear it to / from the gym though for the stop watch function. Does that job well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, though a cheap feeling to it
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good watch and works the way it's intended to though the only issues I had was the band can be scraped easily against a wall or any hard surface, and when pressing the button to lit up the watch, it looks pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Esteban

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY AND LOVE IT DONT THINK I WILL EVER BUY ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY AND LOVE IT DONT THINK I WILL EVER BUY ANOTHER G-SHOCK LOVE THE BLACK AND BLUE AND THEY ARE MY FAVORITE COLORS AS WELL AS SLIVER IF YOU ARE THINKING ABOUT THIS WATCH DONT THINK JUST BUY IT YOU WON'T REGRET IT I LOVE IT AND COULDNT BE MORE HAPPIER PLUS IT WAS MY BIRTHDAY PRESENT G-SHOCK ALL THE WAY BABY
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, plus the reliability and durability of a G-Shock. Win, win!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. Nice looking watch, with the reliability and durability of a G-Shock. He works in a warehouse, so this is just what he needed just in case it takes a beating! Several warehouse members have commented on his watch, too, so it catches attention.
customer_reviews.author: mamosainGA

customer_reviews.title: Prime & price, you just can't beat it, plus I'm offered warranties, aloha Doreen Koruan
customer_reviews.text: It was Christmas gift for my Husband! It was exactly what he wanted, color especially! I couldn't beat the price! In my ohana=family in Hawaiian, I'm known as the "AMAZON PRIME QUEEN SHOPPER LOL."
customer_reviews.author: Koli17

customer_reviews.title: christmas gift for my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: He loved it and everyone else does as well and even random people. It looks really nice and finely made. It fit him a little small but hes a big guy hes 6 feet and ways 234 pounds and plays football, so you can have an idea how big the watch is. He was incredibly happy so im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loves it! good size for his wrist he's 6'2 and works outside in Solar Industry it is holding up great !
customer_reviews.author: Shireen Elmo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great basic everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic everyday watch. Looks great. Good color combination. The band is very glossy black. The light does a decent job of making the time visible in the dark. I would give it 5 stars if it were a little easier to read in dim light without having to activate the illumination.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Avorio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent the blue background with the white numbers very very ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent the blue background with the white numbers very very visible it's almost like HD television
customer_reviews.author: don thomas

customer_reviews.title: Slick watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been a huge Nixon fan over the years. Recently I have purchased some G-Shock watches and haven't been let down. This watch is great looking, light weight, reliable, accurate. I Iove the larger faced watches and this is one of them. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Eliteaviatorr

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking watch. Provides all the basic features plus. Strap is much more sturdier then expected. I like especially the feature where just the turn of your wrist it will light up at night and you can see what time it is
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bear

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my wife and she adores it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she adores it. The illumination sets this watch apart from others in its class.
customer_reviews.author: Beester

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wear well and feels great on wrist; very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks to be another winner and looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: Owned several G-Shocks over the years with no issues from any. This looks to be another winner and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: New Casio Watch met expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it met my expectations. It was backlit and multi-functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To see if he date and time!! Clearly
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my husband , he is a police officer and he said it was one of the best watches that I’ve ever bought For him.
customer_reviews.author: melinda thomas

customer_reviews.title: This os one of my favorite watches that i've bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This os one of my favorite watches that i've bought from Amazon. And my fiance loved it just as much, unfortunatley he didn't have it tighten good enough and it fell off in the ocean when we were swimming. I'll defianlty buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: The backlight isn't as bright as I had hoped. I didn't realize it was solar powered when I ordered it but it works well once you decipher the owners manual. Looks good and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: JoelP

customer_reviews.title: it is very easy to see and very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband, and he absolutely loves it. It looks very sharp in person, and even with the white numbering, it is very easy to see and very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Winkeljohn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful watch that just looks great and very stylish. Not difficult to use, setup is easy. Has a black glossy band and frame. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Holder

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Would be better if the band wasn’t shiny. Love it either way.
customer_reviews.author: albert alvarez

customer_reviews.title: A good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color combination! I like the big numbers!
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM M GARDNER

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks absolutely gorgeous! I really like how classy and shiny the band is. This is meant to be a gift for a future sailor so here's hoping that he loves it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kanoilani

customer_reviews.title: I am sure he will love it as it is what he was going to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a going away gift for my nephew and it was what he described to me but I have not given it to him yet. I am sure he will love it as it is what he was going to buy for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Vaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/read
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work on the railroad. Very easy to read, fits nice, and all around kicks ass!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: The bf loves it
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my boyfriend. he loves it and wears it everyday. it did break the first week ( the strap broke) seller refunded and ordered another one still going strong and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love My G-Shocks
customer_reviews.text: I love my G-Shocks they usually last me about 10 years. The only thing with this one is the black paint on the medal comes off to easy but I just get some black nail polish as a touch up, might have to stop doing that soon since all of the paint is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: r1sf girl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift for my boyfriend. He hasn't open it yet but when it came I took a peek. It's super nice, packaging could have been a little better for the cost of it. Also the only thing I'd have to say about this particular color is that the blue isn't quite as vibrant as it is in the web picture. It blends very good with the black, so if you're going for an obvious color block, then you might be disappointed. However, I like it. Definitely makes it a more versatile with every outfit. Enjoy! These throwback watches are dope.
customer_reviews.author: XENGYENG XIONG

customer_reviews.title: Husbands favorite watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! I would highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Paulann Davis

customer_reviews.title: Casio is a good watch that seems to run forever.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered I wasn't aware of the shinny patten leather look of the band but it is growing on me.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelers
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this watch all the time. I bought it for the dual world time feature and it is wonderful to use, especially when traveling abroad.
customer_reviews.author: EJA

customer_reviews.title: My husband love this watch so much that he had for years ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this watch so much that he had for years and wanted our son to have one and I located it here. What a great find.....I would order again from this site. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: teabear1031

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy watch. A little hard to read without light, which automatically lights up when you tilt your arm. Haven't tried it in pool, yet. But they claim it is water resistant. If there is a problem, I'll add onto this review.
customer_reviews.author: topdog

customer_reviews.title: Made me a huge fan of G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: Best watch I have ever owned. I love Casio's watches and the G-Shock line has been the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. Its a pretty decent looking watch. I hope he likes it just as mush as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Torres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely stunning! We purchased this for my son for a graduation gift from Navy bootcamp.
customer_reviews.author: CUnkel

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: During my research, this G-Shock averaged around $100. I got it through Amazon for $90 and with free shipping! I love the watch! I'm a big G-Shock fan and this is the best one I've owned so far. And the delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Led backlight I expected to be a bit brighter, but material used, design and style just perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Jeyhun Huseynov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great watch and I'm happy to own it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch for EMS
customer_reviews.text: I am a paramedic and this watch looks good with my dark blue uniform and it functions very well. Easy to see the digits and the light function for nights calls is bright - don't have to strain to see the digits. Have gotten many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Neil S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice, you're making the right choice.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, picture doesn't do it justice. Even the packaging was perfect! It arrived on time, almost to the second. The watch is a huge success. I will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Really cool watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. Has all the features I wanted, looks really nice, best watch I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: alec wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch, large size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. After you get used to the larger size it looks great on your wrist. Functions really well and the larger size buttons make using it really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy having this watch. All my other watches have been Casio, so I know this a great brand. I was draw to it by the black and blue colors. This watch just scream my name. And it has all the functions I need, plus with my active lifestyle this watch is a perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: i bought it for my nephew and he loved it so
customer_reviews.text: very elegant and shiny, i bought it for my nephew and he loved it so much
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Fahmi

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the watch because when using the stopwatch it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the watch because when using the stopwatch it is impossible to know what time it is because no analog.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Has been perfect for my boyfriend who works outside everyday
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for. Has been perfect for my boyfriend who works outside everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quick time zone adjustments are great for when I travel
customer_reviews.text: The quick time zone adjustments are great for when I travel. It is bigger than my last G-Shock. The band is also a higher gloss than I expected. - something I am getting used to. The screen is a little dim, but I am sure that will prolong battery life and I recognize that it has a feature to automatically light the dial upon the turn of your wrist, a feature I left turned off. Very good watch, particularly for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D Blake Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch! Glossy look, so if you need a tac watch, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this watch, he wears it everyday. It keeps time accurately and it looks sharp on him. It definitely has a manly look to it. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lord

customer_reviews.title: A great watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself for Christmas and I really like it. It's a bit complicated to set with the 3 timezones but it's a great looking watch and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough watch still going
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch 5years ago. easy to tell time and never have had to change battery
customer_reviews.author: MDcaps

customer_reviews.title: The features are so cool and the color adds some personality to the
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my adult son who is starting college. He absolutely loves it. The features are so cool and the color adds some personality to the watch. Plus he's a surfer so he can wear it in the water too. Great buy for the money. Quality product, as always from Casio.
customer_reviews.author: Contessa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just needed a watch that was easier to read. Works for now.
customer_reviews.author: ndnjd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect, just as described, no complaints, especially for the price this watch is a no brainer. This cost 20-30 dollars more in the department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Manpreet Singh

customer_reviews.title: BBB Big Black Blue
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I wanted the watch displayed in the image and that's what I got. I needed a watched with a little blue to match certain workout clothing combinations. The size of the watch is SLIGHTLY bigger than other G-Shocks and that's because of the design (Bigger Squares on Left and Right). I give it a 4.5 simply because its not the most attractive watch in MY collection. That has nothing to do with the watch its self, so it doesn't affect the overall rating. New G-Shock collectors don't lose the instructions booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Rell

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a submarine officer or the USN, and his watch is crucial to his job. When his "old" watch broke, he shopped around in person and finally asked if he could look at Amazon. After picking the watch out and ordered it, he expressed concern while we waited that he should have bought a watch in person. When this one came, he was THRILLED. It has all kinds of bells and whistles that I can't begin to articulate. I know he really likes it and would unreservedly recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch and it far exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and it far exceeds my expectations. It is stylish, packs a lot of information, and is very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jim Singer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up to sweat, oil, salt water, and more!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this watch! Lots of complements from friends on it. Between mountain biking, working on cars, and surfing on a weekly basis, it has held up to oil, sweat, and salty water very well so far. I would highly recommend this watch to anyone looking for some style! I do see this as a younger persons watch though, I cannot picture an older guy with this. But that is just my personal opinion. One thing to note is the blue anodizing around the edges is starting to wear off, I am a little disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lacasse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift, and it was well received. Daily use is perfec!
customer_reviews.author: P.H

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my fiancé he is a cop and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Britney Dunn

product_meta.title: Casio Men's G8900A-1CR G-Shock Black and Blue Resin Digital Sport Watch
product_meta.description:
For almost 3 decades, G-SHOCK has been a world standard for tough watches. And with the introduction of the new large case digital, G8900, the world has another sure thing to wear on its wrist. The large case digital is highlighted by a high-intensity led backlight which can be activated by the flick of the wrist or easy-press front button. An aluminum bezel provides a first line of defense to its omni-directional shock resistant structure and the semi-round case bridges the gap between the legendary 5600 and 6900 case styles. Gloss black resin Band digital watch with a blue face.



CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :3 x 5 x 7 inches; 6.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :G8900A-1CR
 * Department :Watches
 * Batteries :1 CR123A batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :November 1, 2011
 * Manufacturer :Cannon Gate Pub Inc
 * ASIN :B006292EOS

feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Shock-resistant sports watch featuring black-and-blue dial with super illuminator LED light, countdown timer, and 1/1000-second stopwatch
52.5 mm resin case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with digital display
Also features flash alert, world time (48 cities and UTC), multi-home time, 12/24 hour formats, and ribbed resin band with buckle closure
Water resistant to 200 m (660 ft): In general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not scuba diving
